thread.section_title: Houston Rockets News from the Houston Chronicle
thread.title: Eric Gordon shares special moment with dad during All-Star break
thread.title_full: Eric Gordon shares special moment with dad during All-Star break

author: Jonathan Feigen
title: Eric Gordon shares special moment with dad during All-Star break
text:
Eric Gordon shares special moment with dad during All-Star break 1 / 9 Back to Gallery 
When Rockets guard Eric Gordon won the 3-point contest on Saturday, he heard from friends and teammates far from New Orleans, but there was one person whose reaction he enjoyed most. 
"Everybody, from family members to teammates, just everybody," Gordon said of the messages he received. "They were happy for me. That was my first time being in it and it was fun to win it." 
Gordon, however, most enjoyed the reaction of his father, Eric Gordon Sr. in New Orleans. 
"The main thing was my dad," Gordon said. "He was there. He's the one that gave me this jump shot and introduced me to this game. It was good to see him there to watch me win it. He was well-known as a big-time 3-point shooter (at Liberty University) when he played. He passed it off to me."
